Solution

Research Goals:

  • Identify the demographics of music streaming services
  • Understand current market trends
  • Determine Spotify’s competitors and their strengths/weaknesses
  • Determine users’ frustrations/motivations/needs/goals
  • Understand users’ experience with Spotify’s social capabilities

Market research

Market Research I started off the project with research to understand and gain insight into the frustrations, and needs of the users. I summarized important points from gathered collection of data and statistics related to the research goals/topic for more insights:
